author: Special Correspondent
text:
Heels on Wheels – an all-women four-wheel treasure hunt – will be held in the city on March 27 (Sunday) as part of the International Women’s Day celebrations.

The event is organised by The Hindu and The Indian Public School, Salem, in association with The Hindu – Tamil Pen Indru.

The treasure hunt will commence from Thiagarajar Polytechnic College from7 a.m. onwards.

Prize distribution

Prize distribution for the treasure hunt will be held at Reliance Mega Mall on Sunday evening.

Women interested in taking part in the ‘Heels on Wheels’ contest can register their names by contacting the mobile numbers: 9843174822 / 9894614147. Spot registrations will be held between 7 a.m. and 8 a.m.

Limited entries only.

The event is presented by The Indian Public School, Salem and powered by Southern Medical Centre Hospital, Salem; activity partner Young Indians, Salem Chapter; mall partner Reliance Mega Mall; venue Partner - Thiagarajar Polytechnic College, Salem.
title: Heels on Wheels in Salem on Sunday
